title: @riot why do people get names that reference notorious terrorists
body: but I can't get a name like WEABOO SLICER?  is it as bad as osama jhin laden or stuff like that?  (i messaged rito support and they say I can't have names like that)

replies.body: Honestly, I think the name filter could be a little more intuitive and it doesn't catch everything.  Whenever you see inappropriate names, make sure to hit that report button so we can tackle it.  For your specific case, you'll have to ask your specialist for more context but I'd wager that it's a non-neutral name that suggest violence towards others.  I hope that helps!
